Package org.gbif.crawler

This is a library providing services to coordinate crawls.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CrawlClient<REQUEST,RESPONSE>
    Implementations of this interface take responsibility for interactions with endpoints.
    CrawlerCoordinatorService
    The public interface of the Crawler Coordinator.
    CrawlListener<CTX extends CrawlContext,REQ,RESP>
    Used to listen for crawl events.
    CrawlStrategy<CTX extends CrawlContext>
    This is used to model a specific way to crawl a dataset.
    RequestHandler<CTX extends CrawlContext,REQ>
    This builds a protocol specific request for a certain crawl context.
    ResponseHandler<RESPONSE,RESULT>
    Implementations of this interface will handle the response received by CrawlClients and produce a result but it also plays a part in the paging through resources.
    RetryPolicy
    Will be called by the crawler to determine if certain operations should be retried after errors during the crawl.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractCrawlListener<CTX extends CrawlContext,REQ,RESP>
    Simple abstract base listener so that you can only have to implement the methods you're interested in.
    CrawlConfiguration
    This is the immutable crawl description holding all information needed to run the crawl.
    CrawlContext
    Base class for any crawl context object.
    Crawler<CTX extends CrawlContext,REQ,RESP,RES>
    This crawler can be used to crawl datasets.
    CrawlerCoordinatorServiceImpl
    This implementation stores crawls in ZooKeeper in a node structure like this: /crawls/<uuid> holds general information about this crawl.
    DatasetProcessServiceImpl
    This DatasetProcessService implementation uses a CuratorFramework instance to communicate with a Zookeeper server.
    EndpointPriorityComparator
    Compares two Endpoints.
    StartCrawlMessageCallback
    This is a callback class to be used with the GBIF Postal Service.
    TestListener
    This is a class that is very useful for testing during crawl.
    UuidSerializer
    Needed by the Curator Queue to serialize and deserialize UUIDs.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AlreadyCrawlingException
    Indicates that we couldn't initiate a crawl because it is already running.

Package org.gbif.crawler Description

This is a library providing services to coordinate crawls. The two things implemented at the moment are:
  • Coordination
  • Metrics

Components

Coordination

Defined in the CrawlerCoordinatorService interface and implemented in the CrawlerCoordinatorServiceImpl class. Allows to initiate crawls.

Metrics

Defined in the org.gbif.api.service.crawler.CrawlerDetailService interface and implemented in the DatasetProcessServiceImpl class. Can be used to return metrics about running crawls.

Usage

As this is only a library you need to write something using these services. That could be a Web service, a CLI or something else entirely.
